about.summary: Creation and use of R Repositories via helper functions to insert packages into a repository, and to add repository information  to the current R session. Two primary types of repositories are support: gh-pages at GitHub, as well as local repositories on either the same machine or a local network. Drat is a recursive acronym: Drat R Archive Template.

name: r-drat
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.5" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-drat
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: drat_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/drat_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/drat/drat_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cd3cf9f1d870e5b56b57cd73a617af21647e538b6d57851ec29653e621610045

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('drat')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('drat')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://dirk.eddelbuettel.com/code/drat.html
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: 'Creation and use of R Repositories via helper functions to insert packages into
    a repository, and to add repository information  to the current R session. Two primary
    types of repositories are support: gh-pages at GitHub, as well as local repositories
    on either the same machine or a local network. Drat is a recursive acronym: Drat
    R Archive Template.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
    - cbrueffer
    - dbast
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
